00030 //
00031 static DBVT_INLINE int                  indexof(const btDbvtNode* node)
00032 {
00033         return(node->parent->childs[1]==node);
00034 }

00036 //
00037 static DBVT_INLINE btDbvtVolume merge(  const btDbvtVolume& a,
00038                                                                           const btDbvtVolume& b)
00039 {
00040 #if (DBVT_MERGE_IMPL==DBVT_IMPL_SSE)
00041         ATTRIBUTE_ALIGNED16( char locals[sizeof(btDbvtAabbMm)]);
00042         btDbvtVolume* ptr = (btDbvtVolume*) locals;
00043         btDbvtVolume&   res=*ptr;
00044 #else
00045                 btDbvtVolume    res;
00046 #endif
00047         Merge(a,b,res);
00048         return(res);
00049 }
00050 
00051 // volume+edge lengths
00052 static DBVT_INLINE btScalar             size(const btDbvtVolume& a)
00053 {
00054         const btVector3 edges=a.Lengths();
00055         return( edges.x()*edges.y()*edges.z()+
00056                 edges.x()+edges.y()+edges.z());
00057 }

00059 //
00060 static void                                             getmaxdepth(const btDbvtNode* node,int depth,int& maxdepth)
00061 {
00062         if(node->isinternal())
00063         {
00064                 getmaxdepth(node->childs[0],depth+1,maxdepth);
00065                 getmaxdepth(node->childs[1],depth+1,maxdepth);
00066         } else maxdepth=btMax(maxdepth,depth);
00067 }

00069 //
00070 static DBVT_INLINE void                 deletenode(     btDbvt* pdbvt,
00071                                                                                    btDbvtNode* node)
00072 {
00073         btAlignedFree(pdbvt->m_free);
00074         pdbvt->m_free=node;
00075 }
00076 
00077 //
00078 static void                                             recursedeletenode(      btDbvt* pdbvt,
00079                                                                                                   btDbvtNode* node)
00080 {
00081         if(!node->isleaf())
00082         {
00083                 recursedeletenode(pdbvt,node->childs[0]);
00084                 recursedeletenode(pdbvt,node->childs[1]);
00085         }
00086         if(node==pdbvt->m_root) pdbvt->m_root=0;
00087         deletenode(pdbvt,node);
00088 }

00090 //
00091 static DBVT_INLINE btDbvtNode*  createnode(     btDbvt* pdbvt,
00092                                                                                    btDbvtNode* parent,
00093                                                                                    void* data)
00094 {
00095         btDbvtNode*     node;
00096         if(pdbvt->m_free)
00097         { node=pdbvt->m_free;pdbvt->m_free=0; }
00098         else
00099         { node=new(btAlignedAlloc(sizeof(btDbvtNode),16)) btDbvtNode(); }
00100         node->parent    =       parent;
00101         node->data              =       data;
00102         node->childs[1] =       0;
00103         return(node);
00104 }

00106 //
00107 static DBVT_INLINE btDbvtNode*  createnode(     btDbvt* pdbvt,
00108                                                                                    btDbvtNode* parent,
00109                                                                                    const btDbvtVolume& volume,
00110                                                                                    void* data)
00111 {
00112         btDbvtNode*     node=createnode(pdbvt,parent,data);
00113         node->volume=volume;
00114         return(node);

00117 //
00118 static DBVT_INLINE btDbvtNode*  createnode(     btDbvt* pdbvt,
00119                                                                                    btDbvtNode* parent,
00120                                                                                    const btDbvtVolume& volume0,
00121                                                                                    const btDbvtVolume& volume1,
00122                                                                                    void* data)
00123 {
00124         btDbvtNode*     node=createnode(pdbvt,parent,data);
00125         Merge(volume0,volume1,node->volume);
00126         return(node);
00127 }

00129 //
00130 static void                                             insertleaf(     btDbvt* pdbvt,
00131                                                                                    btDbvtNode* root,
00132                                                                                    btDbvtNode* leaf)
00133 {
00134         if(!pdbvt->m_root)
00135         {
00136                 pdbvt->m_root   =       leaf;
00137                 leaf->parent    =       0;
00138         }
00139         else
00140         {
00141                 if(!root->isleaf())
00142                 {
00143                         do      {
00144                                 root=root->childs[Select(       leaf->volume,
00145                                         root->childs[0]->volume,
00146                                         root->childs[1]->volume)];
00147                         } while(!root->isleaf());
00148                 }
00149                 btDbvtNode*     prev=root->parent;
00150                 btDbvtNode*     node=createnode(pdbvt,prev,leaf->volume,root->volume,0);
00151                 if(prev)
00152                 {
00153                         prev->childs[indexof(root)]     =       node;
00154                         node->childs[0]                         =       root;root->parent=node;
00155                         node->childs[1]                         =       leaf;leaf->parent=node;
00156                         do      {
00157                                 if(!prev->volume.Contain(node->volume))
00158                                         Merge(prev->childs[0]->volume,prev->childs[1]->volume,prev->volume);
00159                                 else
00160                                         break;
00161                                 node=prev;
00162                         } while(0!=(prev=node->parent));
00163                 }
00164                 else
00165                 {
00166                         node->childs[0] =       root;root->parent=node;
00167                         node->childs[1] =       leaf;leaf->parent=node;
00168                         pdbvt->m_root   =       node;
00169                 }
00170         }
00171 }
00172 
00173 //
00174 static btDbvtNode*                              removeleaf(     btDbvt* pdbvt,
00175                                                                                    btDbvtNode* leaf)
00176 {
00177         if(leaf==pdbvt->m_root)
00178         {
00179                 pdbvt->m_root=0;
00180                 return(0);
00181         }
00182         else
00183         {
00184                 btDbvtNode*     parent=leaf->parent;
00185                 btDbvtNode*     prev=parent->parent;
00186                 btDbvtNode*     sibling=parent->childs[1-indexof(leaf)];                        
00187                 if(prev)
00188                 {
00189                         prev->childs[indexof(parent)]=sibling;
00190                         sibling->parent=prev;
00191                         deletenode(pdbvt,parent);
00192                         while(prev)
00193                         {
00194                                 const btDbvtVolume      pb=prev->volume;
00195                                 Merge(prev->childs[0]->volume,prev->childs[1]->volume,prev->volume);
00196                                 if(NotEqual(pb,prev->volume))
00197                                 {
00198                                         prev=prev->parent;
00199                                 } else break;
00200                         }
00201                         return(prev?prev:pdbvt->m_root);
00202                 }
00203                 else
00204                 {                                                               
00205                         pdbvt->m_root=sibling;
00206                         sibling->parent=0;
00207                         deletenode(pdbvt,parent);
00208                         return(pdbvt->m_root);
00209                 }                       
00210         }
00211 }
00212 
00213 //
00214 static void                                             fetchleaves(btDbvt* pdbvt,
00215                                                                                         btDbvtNode* root,
00216                                                                                         tNodeArray& leaves,
00217                                                                                         int depth=-1)
00218 {
00219         if(root->isinternal()&&depth)
00220         {
00221                 fetchleaves(pdbvt,root->childs[0],leaves,depth-1);
00222                 fetchleaves(pdbvt,root->childs[1],leaves,depth-1);
00223                 deletenode(pdbvt,root);
00224         }
00225         else
00226         {
00227                 leaves.push_back(root);
00228         }
00229 }

00231 //
00232 static bool                                             leftOfAxis(     const btDbvtNode* node,
00233                                                                                    const btVector3& org,
00234                                                                                    const btVector3& axis)
00235 {
00236         return btDot(axis, node->volume.Center() - org) <= 0;
00237 }

00239 
00240 // Partitions leaves such that leaves[0, n) are on the
00241 // left of axis, and leaves[n, count) are on the right
00242 // of axis. returns N.
00243 static int                                              split(  btDbvtNode** leaves,
00244                                                                           int count,
00245                                                                           const btVector3& org,
00246                                                                           const btVector3& axis)
00247 {
00248         int begin=0;
00249         int end=count;
00250         for(;;)
00251         {
00252                 while(begin!=end && leftOfAxis(leaves[begin],org,axis))
00253                 {
00254                         ++begin;
00255                 }
00256 
00257                 if(begin==end)
00258                 {
00259                         break;
00260                 }
00261 
00262                 while(begin!=end && !leftOfAxis(leaves[end-1],org,axis))
00263                 {
00264                         --end;
00265                 }
00266 
00267                 if(begin==end)
00268                 {
00269                         break;
00270                 }
00271 
00272                 // swap out of place nodes
00273                 --end;
00274                 btDbvtNode* temp=leaves[begin];
00275                 leaves[begin]=leaves[end];
00276                 leaves[end]=temp;
00277                 ++begin;
00278         }
00279 
00280         return begin;
00281 }
00282 
00283 //
00284 static btDbvtVolume                             bounds( btDbvtNode** leaves,
00285                                                                            int count)
00286 {
00287 #if DBVT_MERGE_IMPL==DBVT_IMPL_SSE
00288         ATTRIBUTE_ALIGNED16(char        locals[sizeof(btDbvtVolume)]);
00289         btDbvtVolume* ptr = (btDbvtVolume*) locals;
00290         btDbvtVolume&   volume=*ptr;
00291         volume=leaves[0]->volume;
00292 #else
00293         btDbvtVolume volume=leaves[0]->volume;
00294 #endif
00295         for(int i=1,ni=count;i<ni;++i)
00296         {
00297                 Merge(volume,leaves[i]->volume,volume);
00298         }
00299         return(volume);
00300 }
00301 
00302 //
00303 static void                                             bottomup(       btDbvt* pdbvt,
00304                                                                                  btDbvtNode** leaves,
00305                                                                                  int count)
00306 {
00307         while(count>1)
00308         {
00309                 btScalar        minsize=SIMD_INFINITY;
00310                 int                     minidx[2]={-1,-1};
00311                 for(int i=0;i<count;++i)
00312                 {
00313                         for(int j=i+1;j<count;++j)
00314                         {
00315                                 const btScalar  sz=size(merge(leaves[i]->volume,leaves[j]->volume));
00316                                 if(sz<minsize)
00317                                 {
00318                                         minsize         =       sz;
00319                                         minidx[0]       =       i;
00320                                         minidx[1]       =       j;
00321                                 }
00322                         }
00323                 }
00324                 btDbvtNode*     n[]     =       {leaves[minidx[0]],leaves[minidx[1]]};
00325                 btDbvtNode*     p       =       createnode(pdbvt,0,n[0]->volume,n[1]->volume,0);
00326                 p->childs[0]            =       n[0];
00327                 p->childs[1]            =       n[1];
00328                 n[0]->parent            =       p;
00329                 n[1]->parent            =       p;
00330                 leaves[minidx[0]]       =       p;
00331                 leaves[minidx[1]]       =       leaves[count-1];
00332                 --count;
00333         }
00334 }
00335 
00336 //
00337 static btDbvtNode*                      topdown(btDbvt* pdbvt,
00338                                                                         btDbvtNode** leaves,
00339                                                                         int count,
00340                                                                         int bu_treshold)
00341 {
00342         static const btVector3  axis[]={btVector3(1,0,0),
00343                 btVector3(0,1,0),
00344                 btVector3(0,0,1)};
00345         btAssert(bu_treshold>2);
00346         if(count>1)
00347         {
00348                 if(count>bu_treshold)
00349                 {
00350                         const btDbvtVolume      vol=bounds(leaves,count);
00351                         const btVector3                 org=vol.Center();
00352                         int                                             partition;
00353                         int                                             bestaxis=-1;
00354                         int                                             bestmidp=count;
00355                         int                                             splitcount[3][2]={{0,0},{0,0},{0,0}};
00356                         int i;
00357                         for( i=0;i<count;++i)
00358                         {
00359                                 const btVector3 x=leaves[i]->volume.Center()-org;
00360                                 for(int j=0;j<3;++j)
00361                                 {
00362                                         ++splitcount[j][btDot(x,axis[j])>0?1:0];
00363                                 }
00364                         }
00365                         for( i=0;i<3;++i)
00366                         {
00367                                 if((splitcount[i][0]>0)&&(splitcount[i][1]>0))
00368                                 {
00369                                         const int       midp=(int)btFabs(btScalar(splitcount[i][0]-splitcount[i][1]));
00370                                         if(midp<bestmidp)
00371                                         {
00372                                                 bestaxis=i;
00373                                                 bestmidp=midp;
00374                                         }
00375                                 }
00376                         }
00377                         if(bestaxis>=0)
00378                         {
00379                                 partition=split(leaves,count,org,axis[bestaxis]);
00380                                 btAssert(partition!=0 && partition!=count);
00381                         }
00382                         else
00383                         {
00384                                 partition=count/2+1;
00385                         }
00386                         btDbvtNode*     node=createnode(pdbvt,0,vol,0);
00387                         node->childs[0]=topdown(pdbvt,&leaves[0],partition,bu_treshold);
00388                         node->childs[1]=topdown(pdbvt,&leaves[partition],count-partition,bu_treshold);
00389                         node->childs[0]->parent=node;
00390                         node->childs[1]->parent=node;
00391                         return(node);
00392                 }
00393                 else
00394                 {
00395                         bottomup(pdbvt,leaves,count);
00396                         return(leaves[0]);
00397                 }
00398         }
00399         return(leaves[0]);
00400 }
00401 
00402 //
00403 static DBVT_INLINE btDbvtNode*  sort(btDbvtNode* n,btDbvtNode*& r)
00404 {
00405         btDbvtNode*     p=n->parent;
00406         btAssert(n->isinternal());
00407         if(p>n)
00408         {
00409                 const int               i=indexof(n);
00410                 const int               j=1-i;
00411                 btDbvtNode*     s=p->childs[j];
00412                 btDbvtNode*     q=p->parent;
00413                 btAssert(n==p->childs[i]);
00414                 if(q) q->childs[indexof(p)]=n; else r=n;
00415                 s->parent=n;
00416                 p->parent=n;
00417                 n->parent=q;
00418                 p->childs[0]=n->childs[0];
00419                 p->childs[1]=n->childs[1];
00420                 n->childs[0]->parent=p;
00421                 n->childs[1]->parent=p;
00422                 n->childs[i]=p;
00423                 n->childs[j]=s;
00424                 btSwap(p->volume,n->volume);
00425                 return(p);
00426         }
00427         return(n);
00428 }

00458 //
00459 void                    btDbvt::clear()
00460 {
00461         if(m_root)      
00462                 recursedeletenode(this,m_root);
00463         btAlignedFree(m_free);
00464         m_free=0;
00465         m_lkhd          =       -1;
00466         m_stkStack.clear();
00467         m_opath         =       0;

00471 //
00472 void                    btDbvt::optimizeBottomUp()
00473 {
00474         if(m_root)
00475         {
00476                 tNodeArray leaves;
00477                 leaves.reserve(m_leaves);
00478                 fetchleaves(this,m_root,leaves);
00479                 bottomup(this,&leaves[0],leaves.size());
00480                 m_root=leaves[0];
00481         }
00482 }
00483 
00484 //
00485 void                    btDbvt::optimizeTopDown(int bu_treshold)
00486 {
00487         if(m_root)
00488         {
00489                 tNodeArray      leaves;
00490                 leaves.reserve(m_leaves);
00491                 fetchleaves(this,m_root,leaves);
00492                 m_root=topdown(this,&leaves[0],leaves.size(),bu_treshold);
00493         }
00494 }

00496 //
00497 void                    btDbvt::optimizeIncremental(int passes)
00498 {
00499         if(passes<0) passes=m_leaves;
00500         if(m_root&&(passes>0))
00501         {
00502                 do      {
00503                         btDbvtNode*             node=m_root;
00504                         unsigned        bit=0;
00505                         while(node->isinternal())
00506                         {
00507                                 node=sort(node,m_root)->childs[(m_opath>>bit)&1];
00508                                 bit=(bit+1)&(sizeof(unsigned)*8-1);
00509                         }
00510                         update(node);
00511                         ++m_opath;
00512                 } while(--passes);
00513         }
00514 }

00520         insertleaf(this,m_root,leaf);
00521         ++m_leaves;

00525 //
00526 void                    btDbvt::update(btDbvtNode* leaf,int lookahead)
00527 {
00528         btDbvtNode*     root=removeleaf(this,leaf);
00529         if(root)
00530         {
00531                 if(lookahead>=0)
00532                 {
00533                         for(int i=0;(i<lookahead)&&root->parent;++i)
00534                         {
00535                                 root=root->parent;
00536                         }
00537                 } else root=m_root;
00538         }
00539         insertleaf(this,root,leaf);
00540 }
00541 
00542 //
00543 void                    btDbvt::update(btDbvtNode* leaf,btDbvtVolume& volume)
00544 {
00545         btDbvtNode*     root=removeleaf(this,leaf);
00546         if(root)
00547         {
00548                 if(m_lkhd>=0)
00549                 {
00550                         for(int i=0;(i<m_lkhd)&&root->parent;++i)
00551                         {
00552                                 root=root->parent;
00553                         }
00554                 } else root=m_root;
00555         }
00556         leaf->volume=volume;
00557         insertleaf(this,root,leaf);
00558 }

00560 //
00561 bool                    btDbvt::update(btDbvtNode* leaf,btDbvtVolume& volume,const btVector3& velocity,btScalar margin)
00562 {
00563         if(leaf->volume.Contain(volume)) return(false);
00564         volume.Expand(btVector3(margin,margin,margin));
00565         volume.SignedExpand(velocity);
00566         update(leaf,volume);
00567         return(true);
00568 }
00569

00571 bool                    btDbvt::update(btDbvtNode* leaf,btDbvtVolume& volume,const btVector3& velocity)
00572 {
00573         if(leaf->volume.Contain(volume)) return(false);
00574         volume.SignedExpand(velocity);
00575         update(leaf,volume);
00576         return(true);
00577 }

00588 //

00596 //
00597 void                    btDbvt::write(IWriter* iwriter) const
00598 {
00599         btDbvtNodeEnumerator    nodes;
00600         nodes.nodes.reserve(m_leaves*2);
00601         enumNodes(m_root,nodes);
00602         iwriter->Prepare(m_root,nodes.nodes.size());
00603         for(int i=0;i<nodes.nodes.size();++i)
00604         {
00605                 const btDbvtNode* n=nodes.nodes[i];
00606                 int                     p=-1;
00607                 if(n->parent) p=nodes.nodes.findLinearSearch(n->parent);
00608                 if(n->isinternal())
00609                 {
00610                         const int       c0=nodes.nodes.findLinearSearch(n->childs[0]);
00611                         const int       c1=nodes.nodes.findLinearSearch(n->childs[1]);
00612                         iwriter->WriteNode(n,i,p,c0,c1);
00613                 }
00614                 else
00615                 {
00616                         iwriter->WriteLeaf(n,i,p);
00617                 }       
00618         }
00619 }
00620 
00621 //
00622 void                    btDbvt::clone(btDbvt& dest,IClone* iclone) const
00623 {
00624         dest.clear();
00625         if(m_root!=0)
00626         {       
00627                 btAlignedObjectArray<sStkCLN>   stack;
00628                 stack.reserve(m_leaves);
00629                 stack.push_back(sStkCLN(m_root,0));
00630                 do      {
00631                         const int               i=stack.size()-1;
00632                         const sStkCLN   e=stack[i];
00633                         btDbvtNode*                     n=createnode(&dest,e.parent,e.node->volume,e.node->data);
00634                         stack.pop_back();
00635                         if(e.parent!=0)
00636                                 e.parent->childs[i&1]=n;
00637                         else
00638                                 dest.m_root=n;
00639                         if(e.node->isinternal())
00640                         {
00641                                 stack.push_back(sStkCLN(e.node->childs[0],n));
00642                                 stack.push_back(sStkCLN(e.node->childs[1],n));
00643                         }
00644                         else
00645                         {
00646                                 iclone->CloneLeaf(n);
00647                         }
00648                 } while(stack.size()>0);
00649         }
00650 }

00652 //
00653 int                             btDbvt::maxdepth(const btDbvtNode* node)
00654 {
00655         int     depth=0;
00656         if(node) getmaxdepth(node,1,depth);
00657         return(depth);
00658 }

00660 //
00661 int                             btDbvt::countLeaves(const btDbvtNode* node)
00662 {
00663         if(node->isinternal())
00664                 return(countLeaves(node->childs[0])+countLeaves(node->childs[1]));
00665         else
00666                 return(1);
00667 }
00668 
00669 //
00670 void                    btDbvt::extractLeaves(const btDbvtNode* node,btAlignedObjectArray<const btDbvtNode*>& leaves)
00671 {
00672         if(node->isinternal())
00673         {
00674                 extractLeaves(node->childs[0],leaves);
00675                 extractLeaves(node->childs[1],leaves);
00676         }
00677         else
00678         {
00679                 leaves.push_back(node);
00680         }       
00681 }

00724 
00725 struct btDbvtBenchmark
00726 {
00727         struct NilPolicy : btDbvt::ICollide
00728         {
00729                 NilPolicy() : m_pcount(0),m_depth(-SIMD_INFINITY),m_checksort(true)             {}
00730                 void    Process(const btDbvtNode*,const btDbvtNode*)                            { ++m_pcount; }
00731                 void    Process(const btDbvtNode*)                                                                      { ++m_pcount; }
00732                 void    Process(const btDbvtNode*,btScalar depth)
00733                 {
00734                         ++m_pcount;
00735                         if(m_checksort)
00736                         { if(depth>=m_depth) m_depth=depth; else printf("wrong depth: %f (should be >= %f)\r\n",depth,m_depth); }
00737                 }
00738                 int                     m_pcount;
00739                 btScalar        m_depth;
00740                 bool            m_checksort;
00741         };
00742         struct P14 : btDbvt::ICollide
00743         {
00744                 struct Node
00745                 {
00746                         const btDbvtNode*       leaf;
00747                         btScalar                        depth;
00748                 };
00749                 void Process(const btDbvtNode* leaf,btScalar depth)
00750                 {
00751                         Node    n;
00752                         n.leaf  =       leaf;
00753                         n.depth =       depth;
00754                 }
00755                 static int sortfnc(const Node& a,const Node& b)
00756                 {
00757                         if(a.depth<b.depth) return(+1);
00758                         if(a.depth>b.depth) return(-1);
00759                         return(0);
00760                 }
00761                 btAlignedObjectArray<Node>              m_nodes;
00762         };
00763         struct P15 : btDbvt::ICollide
00764         {
00765                 struct Node
00766                 {
00767                         const btDbvtNode*       leaf;
00768                         btScalar                        depth;
00769                 };
00770                 void Process(const btDbvtNode* leaf)
00771                 {
00772                         Node    n;
00773                         n.leaf  =       leaf;
00774                         n.depth =       dot(leaf->volume.Center(),m_axis);
00775                 }
00776                 static int sortfnc(const Node& a,const Node& b)
00777                 {
00778                         if(a.depth<b.depth) return(+1);
00779                         if(a.depth>b.depth) return(-1);
00780                         return(0);
00781                 }
00782                 btAlignedObjectArray<Node>              m_nodes;
00783                 btVector3                                               m_axis;
00784         };
00785         static btScalar                 RandUnit()
00786         {
00787                 return(rand()/(btScalar)RAND_MAX);
00788         }
00789         static btVector3                RandVector3()
00790         {
00791                 return(btVector3(RandUnit(),RandUnit(),RandUnit()));
00792         }
00793         static btVector3                RandVector3(btScalar cs)
00794         {
00795                 return(RandVector3()*cs-btVector3(cs,cs,cs)/2);
00796         }
00797         static btDbvtVolume     RandVolume(btScalar cs,btScalar eb,btScalar es)
00798         {
00799                 return(btDbvtVolume::FromCE(RandVector3(cs),btVector3(eb,eb,eb)+RandVector3()*es));
00800         }
00801         static btTransform              RandTransform(btScalar cs)
00802         {
00803                 btTransform     t;
00804                 t.setOrigin(RandVector3(cs));
00805                 t.setRotation(btQuaternion(RandUnit()*SIMD_PI*2,RandUnit()*SIMD_PI*2,RandUnit()*SIMD_PI*2).normalized());
00806                 return(t);
00807         }
00808         static void                             RandTree(btScalar cs,btScalar eb,btScalar es,int leaves,btDbvt& dbvt)
00809         {
00810                 dbvt.clear();
00811                 for(int i=0;i<leaves;++i)
00812                 {
00813                         dbvt.insert(RandVolume(cs,eb,es),0);
00814                 }
00815         }
00816 };
00817
